description:
Don't Starve Together is a game where you are thrown into a strange and unexplored world full of odd creatures,
hidden dangers, and ancient secrets known as "The Constant". You must gather resources to craft items and build
structures and farms to help you protect yourself, survive, and most importantly, not starve.

dst-v1.3.2.description:
## Version 1.3.2 (AP World)
- Add manifest in preparation for Archipelago 0.7.0
### Logic
- Add onion farming rule to Salsa Fresca
- Change sea fishing rule to fishing rule for Fish Cordon Bleu and Moqueca
### Client
- Search for active sessions in root DST data folder so dedicated servers can be detected
dst-v1.3.2.title: Don't Starve Together - Version 1.3.2

dst-v1.3.3.description:
## Version 1.3.3 (AP World)
*Optional but highly recommended to update if you play Don't Starve Together, even for ongoing games. This should also fix issues with connecting the client to DST.*
 - Revise option descriptions
### Logic
 - Removed Boards requirement for Glass Cutter logic
### Client
 - Fix old received deaths from being received again when reloading DST before it gets the chance to time out
 - Send full item-send messages including sender, recipient, and found location.
 - Check additional directories for DST save data folder
   - Windows: `C:/DontStarveTogether/DoNotStarveTogether`
   - Linux: `~/.var/app/com.valvesoftware.Steam/.klei/DoNotStarveTogether`
 - Add save_data_directory option to host.yaml
   - This can be used if DST's save data is in none of the known locations, or if you want to play on the beta branch.
 - Make world mismatch message more descriptive and less spammy
dst-v1.3.3.title: Don't Starve Together - Version 1.3.3

v1.0.description:
An implementation of Archipelago Multiworld for Don't Starve Together. This is a beta release. It's feature-complete and playable, but has some bugs and needs some testing and cleanup.

## Features
Most prototyped recipes have been randomized! Instead of learning recipes at a research station, you earn them through item checks.
Item checks can be found several ways:
- Creature kills
- Boss kills
- Researching at crafting stations (science, magic, think tank, ancient, celestial)
- Traded by Crabby Hermit
- Cooking crock pot meals
- Farming giant plants
- In place of rare blueprints
Optionally, you can have traps in your random item pool, including season changing traps!

## Goals
You have a few options to set as your completion condition:
- Survival: Survive the Constant for a set amount of time.
- Bosses (any): Choose from several bosses in the game as your targets. Defeating any selected boss will complete your goal.
- Bosses (all): Choose multiple bosses that all must be defeated before you claim victory!

## Setup:
- Install [Archipelago](https://github.com/ArchipelagoMW/Archipelago/releases)
- Add .apworld to lib/worlds folder of your Archipelago install
- Follow Archipelago's general tutorial on how to generate a game. https://archipelago.gg/tutorial/Archipelago/setup/en
- Subscribe to the mod on the Steam Workshop (https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3218471273) or download the attached mod.
- Once you're all set up, open the Archipelago launcher and run the client for Don't Starve Together. You just have to leave it open.
- Once you're in Don't Starve Together with the mod installed, you can connect to Archipelago in-game.
v1.0.title: Version 1.0

v1.0.1.description:
Version 1.0.1 (AP World)
- Ancient Guardian set to default goal
- Fix playthroughs not generating
- Generation rule tweaks and fixes
- Ranged weapon logic for ranged combat, feather farming, and aggression
- Cannon Kit and Cannonballs required for Moon Quay locations
- Bee Box required for cooking with honey
- Weather Pain required for Crab King and Ancient Fuelweaver
- Luxury Fan or Ice Flingomatic required for summer survival
- Lightning rod required for spring survival
- Electric insulation logic for dairy and moonstorms
- Defeat Eye Of Terror logic for dairy
- Chest required before caves or seafaring
- Piggyback is alternative for Backpack
- Defeat Nightmare Werepig required for Scrappy Werepig
v1.0.1.title: Version 1.0.1

v1.0.2.description:
## Version 1.0.2 (AP World)
- Add option for veggie-only and meat-only cooking locations
- Add Malbatross to valid goal bosses
- Add locations: Pig King, Chester, Hutch, Stagehand, Pirate Stash, Lure Plant, Glommer, Dust Moth, No-Eyed Deer, Moonblind Crow, Misshapen Bird, Moonrock Pengull, Horror Hound, Stuffed Night Cap (cooking)
- Pseudoscience Station, Distilled Knowledge, Bottle Exchange, and Wagstaff prioritized depending on boss goal
- Beekeeper Hat, Ocean Trawler Kit, Tin Fishin' Bin, Life Giving Amulet, Meat Effigy, and Cannon added to logic
- Terrorclaw location deprecated
- Grass Gekko and Merm set to filler on easy difficulty due to not being guaranteed on world gen
- Ancient Guardian, Frostjaw, Nightmare Werepig, and Scrappy Werepig considered easy bosses
- Powder Monkey and Prime Mate checks awarded when they sink
- Crock Pot logic is before ruins on easy difficulty
- Thermal Stone required for winter survival on easy difficulty
- Pengull marked as seasonal

## Version 1.0.2 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Location aliases: Terrorclaw = Terrorbeak; Merm Guard = Merm; Baby Beefalo, Smallbird = Adult variants
- Add locations: Pig King, Chester, Hutch, Stagehand, Pirate Stash, Lure Plant, Glommer, Dust Moth, No-Eyed Deer, Moonblind Crow, Misshapen Bird, Moonrock Pengull, Horror Hound, Stuffed Night Cap (cooking)
- Add peaceful methods of getting checks: capturing, trading, feeding
- Fixed crash when survival goal is selected
v1.0.2.title: Version 1.0.2

v1.1.description:
## Version 1.1 (AP World)
- Add documentation
### Locations
- Add locations: Resting Horror, Moon Stone Event, Oasis, Poison Birchnut Tree, Birchnutter, Mandrake
### Items
- (WIP) Add option to shuffle starting items. (Logic is not completed for this option. Use at your own risk!)
- (WIP) Add option to shuffle Ancient Pseudoscience Station and Celestial Altar items. (Logic is not completed for this option. Use at your own risk!)
- Add Floorings (Cobblestones, Wooden, Carpeted, Checkerboard, Mosaic) as a single bundle item
- Add Replica Relics bundle item
- Add Krampus Sack as AP item
- Cannon Kit bundled with Cannonball
- Dock Kit bundled with Dock Piling
- Nautopilot Kit bundled with Nautopilot Beacon
- Sign bundled with Directional Sign and Mini Sign
- Punching Bag bundled with Bright Boxer and Shadow Boxer
- Telelocator Staff bundled with Telelocator Focus
### Logic
- Shadow Pieces cannot be during moonstorms
- Lightning Conductor (that you put on a mast) added to logic
- Fixed logic involving canaries
- Revisions of expert difficulty, making sure items are minimal to reach goal
### Client
- Client is rewritten and should be more stable.
- Can connect to AP server through the client. Automatically connects to DST server with AP mod enabled. 
- Scrapbook page hints reduced from 3 to 1, and is now randomized

## Version 1.1 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Defeated bosses are tracked on the AP client and persists even if the world is regenerated. (For newly generated AP games only!)
- Locations checks can be completed while offline after connecting to AP server at least once.
- Clicking on a missing item in your crafting menu that is a known hint will say hint information.
- Fix duplicate items being given when disconnecting and reconnecting
- Fix Skittersquid check
- Pinchin' Winch blueprint is no longer buyable from Crabby Hermit
v1.1.title: Version 1.1

v1.1.1.description:
## Version 1.1.1 (AP World)
### Locations:
- Add locations: W.O.B.O.T., Friendly Fruit Fly, Fruit Fly
### Items
- Add option to shuffle starting items. (Logic is completed now)
- Add option to shuffle Ancient Pseudoscience Station and Celestial Altar items. (Logic is completed now)
- Add optional controlled season and moon phase changing items, using sanity and purple gems to trigger
- Add optional Extra Damage Against Bosses buff as AP items
- Add items: Gramophone (bundled with Record), Scrap Wall, Dreadstone Armor, Dreadstone Helm, Auto-Mat-O-Chanic
### Logic
- Iridescent Gem and Krampus Sack item class changed from "filler" to "useful"
- Moggles item class changed from "progression" to "useful" (Because light source is required to get light source)
- Ancient Archive locations, Moon Stone Event, and Shadow Pieces no longer marked seasonal

## Version 1.1.1 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Add new locations, items, season change items, extra damage buff items (See above)
v1.1.1.title: Version 1.1.1

v1.1.1.1.description:
## Version 1.1.1.1 (AP World)
### Logic
- Reorganizing
- Less restrictive rules
- Increase filler research locations
- Expert difficulty gets axe, pickaxe, and hammer
v1.1.1.1.title: Version 1.1.1.1

v1.1.2.description:
## Version 1.1.2 (AP World)
- Fix Shuffle Starting Recipes option to properly disable randomizing items when disabled
### Locations
- Add Sea Weed
### Items
- Dreadstone Armor and Helmet bundled
- Red, Blue, and Green Funcaps bundled
- Mushlight and Glowcap bundled
- Wood Gate and Fence bundled
- Crabby Hermit's Lures bundled
- Thick Fur recipe and physical item given together rather than two separate items
### Logic
- Add year-round survival logic for most bosses on easy difficulty
- Both Football Helmet and Log Suit required for combat, rather than one or the other
- No-Eyed Deer marked as seasonal
- Fixed typoes causing Ham Bat, Ice Staff, and Fire Staff to not be in logic
- Purple Gem item class changed to progression
- Booster Shot moved earlier into healing logic
- Toadstool logic revised to include nonperishable weapons and healing, fast chopping, and fire staff
- Logic for cobblestone arena building added
- Logic for sanity management added, making Top Hat easier to get

## Version 1.1.2 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Interdimensional Blueprints name changed to the item it contains and its recipient
- Emoji are displayed by name in AP chat instead of being converted to "????"
- Fix apostrophes and DST unicode symbols causing an error in the client
- Extra Damage Against Bosses buff changed to an exponential multiplier
- Fix crash starting up a world without caves (still not supported)
- Starting up a world where you've already completed your goal will announce so
- Days survived signal will send even when the player is in caves
v1.1.2.title: Version 1.1.2

v1.1.2.1.description:
## Version 1.1.2.1 (AP World)
### Generator
- Redundant items are no longer added in the world if they're in a player's start_inventory
### Client
- DeathLink now works
v1.1.2.1.title: Version 1.1.2.1

v1.1.2.2.description:
## Version 1.1.2.2 (AP World)
### Generator
- Goal boss locations are pre-filled with "Boss Defeat" items. This fixes an issue with other players collecting your goal check and completing your game for you.
### Client
- Update item name and location name lookup to Archipelago 0.5's API
- Tell player goal conditions when connecting to AP

If generating a game with !collect enabled, it is recommended to update to this AP World.
v1.1.2.2.title: Version 1.1.2.2

v1.1.2.3.description:
## Version 1.1.2.3 (AP World)
### Generator
- Fix "Shuffle Starting Recipes" and "Shuffle No-Unlock Recipes" locking items for DST players with the settings disabled when another DST player has settings enabled.
- Make generations deterministic
### Items
- Deprecate Drop Item trap
- Rename Surprise Slurper to Slurper Trap
### Logic
- Removed logic from Shadow Pieces that attempted disallowing during moonstorms
### Client
- Hints from Scrapbook Pages are deterministic


If generating a game with multiple Don't Starve Together worlds, it is recommended to update to this AP World.
v1.1.2.3.title: Version 1.1.2.3

v1.2.description:
## Version 1.2 (AP World)
### Generator
- Add option to control which regions are shuffled, such as cave, ruins, ocean, and moonstorm
- Tweaked research locations to be more likely to create a balanced selection of veggie/creature and non-veggie/non-creature locations
- Item overflow now gets pushed into starting inventory when there's not enough locations to fill
- Number of junk items can be set in the options, and less likely to be omitted due to item overflow
- Trap options are now percentages, and improved their random rolls
- Ancient Fuelweaver, Celestial Champion, and Scrappy Werepig are no longer locations when bosses_any goal is Ancient Guardian, Crab King, and Nightmare Werepig respectively
- Hint information for research locations includes name of station they're available at
### Locations
- Add Marotter
- Add researchable locations: Marble, Gold Nugget, Flint, Honey, Twigs, Log, Rocks, Fossil Fragments
### Items
- Add Bishop Figure Sketch, Rook Figure Sketch, and Knight Figure Sketch as an option
- Add farmplant seeds for each plant as an option
- Add Kelp Patch as a shuffleable starting recipe
### Logic
- Refactored logic
- Add options to customize logic for lighting, weapons, seasonal gear, base making, backpacks, and healing
- Telelocator Staff logic added to expert difficulty (teleporting to islands)
- Crab King requires advanced boss combat logic
- Revised Moon Quay logic, not logically requiring a cannon to get there
- Gramophone and Feather Pencil item class changed from filler to useful
- Bundling Wrap, Wax Paper, Beeswax, Kelp Bumper Kit, Pan Flute, Thulecite Club item class changed from progression to useful and no longer used for logic
- Items are only classified as progression when in logic for your settings
- Retinazor and Spazmatism added to Electrical Doodad logic when both on expert difficulty and have boss locations on all or prioritized
- Disallow progression items for seasonal and rng locations
- Disallow progression items for moonstorm region if boss locations is on easy or none and Celestial Champion is not the goal boss
### Client
- Boss locations are scouted
- Hint information is sent to DST for examining

## Version 1.2 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Add console command ArchipelagoDST.CollectLocation("Location Name" or id)
- Add new locations and items
- Receiving Bishop/Rook/Knight Figure Sketch unlocks spawns for corresponding trinkets
- Awaken Nearby Statues recipe added to Celestial Altar, as a solution to potentially being locked from Shadow Pieces during a moonstorm (Temporary; will change)
- Generic seeds make only weeds when seed AP items are enabled
- Examining missing checks will mention it's one of your missing checks
- Examining bosses or objects related or things that have been hinted to them will give info on the item that it contains
- Gourmet Salt Lick is bundled with Salt Lick
- New Crab King mobs are affected by Extra Damage Against Bosses
- Breaking Gnarwail's horn gives check for Gnarwail
v1.2.title: Version 1.2

v1.2.0.1.description:
## Version 1.2.0.1 (AP World)
### Logic
- Fix missing cave logic from ruins logic
- Check for pumpkin seeds for canary logic
- Check for potato seeds for astroggles logic
### Client
- Tell player if their world needs caves (Only if generated on this version or later)
v1.2.0.1.title: Version 1.2.0.1

v1.2.1.description:
## Version 1.2.1 (AP World)
- Add option to toggle individual seasons
- Add option to toggle individual day phases
- Add option to choose starting season
- Add option to set bosses to give bonus items
- Add options for crafting modes: vanilla, journey, free build, free samples, lock ingredients
- Add "Random" option for Boss Defeat Requirement
- Setting Boss Locations to none now removes their checks except the ones that are your goal condition
- Add peaceful option for Creature Locations option
- Crabby Hermit hint information includes required friendship level
- Ocean regions is forced to not include moonstorm if Crab King is not a check or goal
### Locations
- Add researchable location Light Bulb
### Items
- Add Damage Bonus
### Logic
- Enabled logic for excluded locations, allowing trackers to have access to it
- When Creature Locations is set to peaceful, logic prefers peaceful methods
- No longer consider butter for dairy logic due to rng
- Butter logic requires half your progression items
- Require hammer for Guacamole
- Celestial Orb checks marked as "rng" and may not have progression items
- Glommer marked as "seasonal", only having progression on unlockable seasons mode
- Fix backpack logic not disabling properly when disabled
- Fix missing rule for Science (Rocks)
### Client
- Give info on world generation settings when connecting to Archipelago
- Fix error when a disabled boss check is scouted when it drops a blueprint

## Version 1.2.1 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Add crafting modes: vanilla, journey, free build, free samples, lock ingredients
- Add configuration option for starting stacks and damage multipliers for Extra Damage Against Bosses
- Add configuration option for Death Link and Crafting Mode overrides
- Season helper items use only 15 sanity and no purple gem
- Check info when examining now also works on researchable items
- Hinted items are shown in their regular filters in the crafting menu
- Archipelago client ip is now stored in ArchipelagoDST.AP_CLIENT_IP This can be changed to a different value if you want the AP client to be running on a different machine than the DST server
v1.2.1.title: Version 1.2.1

v1.2.1.1.description:
## Version 1.2.1.1 (AP World)
### Client
- Fix connection being reset while sending data to DST (probably)
- Client only listens to DST on localhost
v1.2.1.1.title: Version 1.2.1.1

v1.2.2.description:
## Version 1.2.2 (AP World)
### Logic
- Add 1 season passed rule to No-Eyed Deer and Klaus
- Add chopping rule to Moon Moth
- Add summer rule to Succulent
- Remove fishing rule for fig recipes
### Client
- Fix connection being reset while sending data to DST (probably)
- Add logged error and retry when client fails to bind to socket due to client already being open.
- Log client version
- Log DST generator version on connecting to Archipelago

## Version 1.2.2 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Added in-game tracker, allowing you to view your goal and checks and useful info.
- Removed connecting through widget, replaced with tracker button.
- Examining veggie seeds gives check info if research veggie or giant veggie check is locked behind it.
- Fix crash that sometimes happens when quitting while disconnected from the AP client.
v1.2.2.title: Version 1.2.2

v1.2.2.1.description:
## Version 1.2.2.1 (AP World)
- Fix traps and junk items being classified as progression.
### Logic
- Add cave exploration rule to Nightmare Werepig.
- Add cave exploration or sea fishing rule to Ceviche.
- Change autumn and spring requirement to autumn or spring for Crabby Hermit's umbrella quest when counting possible friendship points.
- Change Crabby Hermit Kill Lure Plant rule to spring and nonspring rule (spawns when changing to or from spring).
### Client
- Improve hint handling when multiples of an item or item id exist in multiworld.

## Version 1.2.2.1 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Improve hint handling when multiples of an item or item id exist in multiworld.
- Add config option for trap decoy name chance.
- Tracker fixes.
- Tracker lists missing sub-ingredients in requirements.
- In Hard Logic filter only shows things in hard logic and not easy logic.
- Portable Crock Pot dishes in the tracker will correctly say it can be made there rather than the Crock Pot.
- Remove Basic Survival rule from tracker.
- Check existence of Celestial Orb, Grass Gekko, Lure Plant, and Merm for tracker requirements.
- Fix Thick Fur not being properly locked.
- No longer give free Thick Fur when crafting mode is free samples or free build.
- Fixed blueprints of locked items not being locked when their source is not a check.
v1.2.2.1.title: Version 1.2.2.1

v1.2.2.2.description:
## Version 1.2.2.2 (AP World)
### Logic
- Remove ocean tag from Pengull
- Remove Magiluminescence logic when on light caves no ocean settings
### Client
- Scrapbook hints can no longer hint a goal boss

## Version 1.2.2.2 (Steam Workshop Mod)
- Fix tracker being empty when exiting caves
v1.2.2.2.title: Version 1.2.2.2

v1.2.2.3.description:
## Version 1.2.2.3 (AP World)
### Logic
- No longer prioritize locations except when boss fill option is priority.
- No longer exclude locations based on logic difficulty.
- Add pre-basic boating rule to Bottle Exchange locations, so bottle logic isn't skipped by Teleportation Staff logic.
- Change Dangling Depth Dweller rule to cave exploration rule instead of ruins exploration rule.

## Version 1.2.2.3 (Steam Workshop Mod)
### Tracker
- Add pre-basic boating rule to Bottle Exchange locations.
- Change Dangling Depth Dweller rule to cave exploration rule instead of ruins exploration rule.
- Add Webber to spider rules.
v1.2.2.3.title: Version 1.2.2.3

v1.2.2.4.description:
## Version 1.2.2.4 (AP World)
### Logic
- Beefalo Wool uses basic combat rule in spring-only world.
- Fix Puffin not being a check on dusk-only worlds.
- Prevent Glommer's Goop and Iridescent Gem being a check on nightless worlds.
v1.2.2.4.title: Version 1.2.2.4
